document.full_text: as tank and artillery fire booms over the libyan desert once more and soldiers fight over desolate towns, the graves of the dead from world war two battles are a reminder of past struggles against oppression.
document.title: world war two graves testify to past bloodshed in libya
lines_and_colors: as tank and artillery fire booms over the libyan desert once more and soldiers fight over desolate towns, the graves of the dead from world war two battles are a reminder of past struggles against oppression.
